activities: ePS collects personal data of potential participants in clinical studies and stores that data.  Additionally, ePS stores personal data of site personnel, study sponsor employee's that is transferred to ePS.  ePS also stores key coded trial subject data that is transferred to ePS.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: BBB EU Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure
